It was mixed reasonably well.Is members only: trueIs variant of: Prayer enhanceUses infobox: ItemImage: File:Prayer enhance (1).pngWeight: 0.020Value: 40Version anchor: 1 doseRelease date: 5 January 2017Item ID: 20965

A prayer enhance is a potion that restores the player's prayer points over the course of 275 or 290 seconds, appearing to vary per player; those who get a game message in the chatbox that the potion is about to expire has the effect last for a total of 290 seconds. However, those that do not have the effect last for a total of 275 seconds.

It can be made with 65 Herblore by using a buchu leaf with a water-filled gourd vial while having a cicely in the inventory.

This potion is the standard variant of the prayer enhance potions, and cannot be taken out of the Chambers of Xeric.

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
28 May 2020
(update | poll)

The value was changed from 2 to 40 so that they are more likely to appear on top of the loot pile alongside raid supplies and bones.

22 March 2018
(update)

The item's value was increased from 1 to 2.

A '''prayer enhance''' is a potion that restores the player's prayer points over the course of 275 or 290 seconds, appearing to vary per player; those who get a game message in the chatbox that the potion is about to expire has the effect last for a total of 290 seconds. However, those that do not have the effect last for a total of 275 seconds.

It can be made with 65 [[Herblore]] by using a [[buchu leaf]] with a [[water-filled gourd vial]] while having a [[cicely]] in the inventory.

This potion is the standard variant of the prayer enhance potions, and cannot be taken out of the [[Chambers of Xeric]].
